parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> a3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 2.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Variables

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Checks if [[Code|code]] or a variable was compiled final with [[compileFinal]].

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[isFinal]] variable

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> varName: [[String]] - A [[String]] pointing to a variable

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if final, [[false]] if not

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[isFinal]] code

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> code: [[Code]] - Some code

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if final, [[false]] if not

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>myCode = [[compileFinal]] "a = a + 1";
[[if]] ([[isFinal]] myCode) [[then]] {[[systemChat]] "Code is compiled final."};</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[isFinal]] [[BIS_fnc_arsenal]]) then {[[hint]] "You can't edit this function!"};</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Avoid overwrite .rpt warnings<code>[[if]] (![[isFinal]] fnc_myCode) [[then]] { fnc_myCode = [[compileFinal]] str_myCode };</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[compile]] [[compileFinal]]
</value></part></template></root>
